'''Detective Lampert''' is the detective who investigated [[Jill Avery|Jill Avery's]] carjacking.

==History==
When the police arrested the man they believed was the same man who attacked Jill and stole her car, they called her in for a lineup. Detective Lampert instructed her on how it would work and then they got started. When she saw him, she identified him quickly.

==Career==
He is a detective.
